title: Specs: "Variable declarations" don't mention complex constants type.
body:

The sentence:

"If the type is absent and the corresponding expression evaluates to an untyped
constant, the type of the declared variable is bool, int, float64, or string
respectively, depending on whether the value is a boolean, integer, floating-point, or
string constant:"

should IMO also mention complex128 as the type for complex constants. Also a line with
such example should probably be added into the section just bellow (after the ':').
